project.name: PDF Core Font Information
project.description: Collection of PDF core font information files downloaded from Adobe's Developer Center and elsewhere. This collection contains font metrics for the 14 PDF core fonts, CMaps for the PDF CJK fonts and the Adobe Glyph List. The files are stored inside the com/adobe/pdf/pcfi directory. See the individual files for exact licensing information and META-INF/LICENSE.txt for a summary.
